Articles.Content:
I am sure I am replicating a thread but the ones I have checked so far have been closed. I need help installing the Astronomer's Visual Pack, Chatterer and other mods. I download them but am obviously doing something wrong on the install. I have read install guides but can't figure this out. Is there anyone who would be willing to talk me through this? You may contact me at [email protected].

Thanks in advance.

I installed astronomer's visual pack. Its a special mod. It has very specific instructions. You should be able to figure out from the included readme file. I'm not sure about chatterer try looking in the install for the readme too. I'll be able to give you more help once I'm at my computer tomorrow.
